item.title: JIRA Risk Workflow
item.description: This JIRA Risk Workflow can be used to manage the Risk process and ensure that business owners understand the side effects of the decisions they make. Why This workflow needs to be presented and discussed by the community. What How does it work in practice Exporting Risk JIRA Workflow into Atlassian Marketplace Outcomes This Working Session should result in an improved JIRA Risk Workflow. Who The target audience for this working session is:
